archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.2.3: The system design phase should involve the integration of a security architecture that can support the technical security requirements, such as performance, capacity, continuity, scalability, connectivity and compatibility.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
